column5: HERE IS A SITE THAT A FRIEND OF MINE SENT ME THE LINK TO ITS WORTH A LOOK. http://www.pecheenligne.net/en/index.html  HOPE THIS COLD WEATHER KEEPS UP LOOKS LIKE WE MAY STILL GET SOME GREAT ICE FISHING IN!!! BE SAFE AND REMEMBER THIN ICE IS ONLY GOOD FOR ONE THING. MAKING A BIG SPLASH LOL
great site, they sure had some huge muskies in their album section!
